description:
Do you have questions concerning loans, savings & deposits? According to the equation
Co * q ** n = Cn
this app calculates one value of a deposit, saving and/or loan separately. If you're interested in this app you may first try the free version 'FinaMath08' which has no credit or monthly options.
Before tapping the '=?'-button the value wanted has to be set to 0. Additionally you have options for montly/yearly and regular payment in arrear/advance.
Remember that even for monthly payments the annual interest is displayed! In those cases the monthly interest factor is displayed under 'ps:'.
The calculation of the interest for the savings or creditrates is only possible by iteration. In case of high interests and/or lots of periods the iteration will be cut to avoid endless loops. Though the resulting closing capital/amount is displayed additionally behind the value for q.
Each calculation may also be sent via email by option.
